explanation: [0-0] Inside a KFC restaurant, a man with his black shirt buttoned only at the top, exposing his skin, is wearing sunglasses and holding KFC fried chicken and a cup. He has a serious expression. Behind him, the KFC's interior decoration is visible, with the outdoor faintly visible through the glass behind. To his right is a red and white striped ordering counter.
[0-3] The man walks forward to the self-service beverage machine and first puts some ice in his cup.

[3-9] Then the camera switches to a first-person perspective. The man, holding the cup, hesitates about which drink to choose. The camera switches back to the man, who moves the cup left and right, finding it difficult to decide which drink to choose. Suddenly, as if remembering something, the man nods his head.
